name: Inconceivable!
description: Tests your luck gaining between one and six buffs! Buff duration and your luck scale with Pips spent. Humiliations Galore: Every Pip generator earn and additional Pip. Bonetti's Defense: Adds 25 in Combat Health Regeneration. Capo Ferro: Gain a chance to attack twice with Saber Attack. Prepare to Die: Increase damage by 9%.  Agrippa: Increase Critial Hit Chance by 9%. Thibault: Increase Critial Hit Amount by 19%.
